DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is 1. To validate in french quality of life questionnaires for food allergic children 2. To evaluate if the quality of life of food allergic french speaking children aged 0-12 years is affected by their condition 3. To validate a didactic game for food allergic children
DOC.brief_title: Assessment of Quality of Life in Food Allergic Children
DOC.criteria: French speaking children with confirmed IgE mediated food allergy Aged 012 years old Inclusion in another trial Chronic severe diseases
